title: URN
summary: URN (Uniform Resource Name) is a URI in a standard format, referring to a resource without specifying its location or whether it exists. This example comes from RFC3986: urn:oasis:names:specification:docbook:dtd:xml:4.1.2

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
